TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PropertyInformationCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase

Docs.summary: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"> objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The PropertyInformationCollection object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> objects. A <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the details of an individual attribute within the configuration. The PropertyInformationCollection object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the PropertyInformationCollection class.
[!CODE [System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#14](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Configuration.PropertyInformation[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Configuration.PropertyInformation[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: A one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array"> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> collection. The <see cref="T:System.Array"> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in at which copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.

Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator"> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection>.

Docs.summary: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> object with the data needed to serialize the <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> instance.

object.
Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"> object in the collection, based on the specified property name.
